languages.text:
The wearer gains immunity to effects depending on the number of {g|f:fc83a8ac57e54db59c3bb70083dc385c}unyielding beacon{/g} stacks:
-<indent=5%>6 or more stacks: immunity to {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>9 or more stacks: immunity to {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>12 or more stacks: immunity to {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}.</indent>
The wearer gains all previous immunities.

-<indent=5%>9 or more stacks: immunity to {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}</indent>
-<indent=5%>12 or more stacks: immunity to {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}</indent>
The wearer gains all previous immunities.

The wearer gains immunity to effects depending on the number of {g|Encyclopedia:UnyieldingBeacon}unyielding beacon{/g} stacks:
-<indent=5%>6 or more stacks: immunity to {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}.</indent>

-<indent=5%>12 or more stacks: immunity to {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}.</indent>

The wearer gains immunity to effects depending on the number of {g|Encyclopedia:UnyieldingBeacon}unyielding beacon{/g} stacks:
-<indent=5%>6 or more stacks: immunity to {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>9 or more stacks: immunity to {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>12 or more stacks: immunity to {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}.</indent>
The wearer gains all previous immunities.

languages.text:
装备者免疫负面效果，取决于{g|f:fc83a8ac57e54db59c3bb70083dc385c}不灭明光{/g}层数：
- <indent=5%>至少6层：免疫{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}。</indent>
- <indent=5%>至少9层：免疫{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}。</indent>
- <indent=5%>至少12层：免疫{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}。</indent>
上述免疫效果可叠加。

-<indent=5%>12 or more stacks: immunity to {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}.</indent>

- <indent=5%>至少9层：免疫{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}</indent>
- <indent=5%>至少12层：免疫{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}</indent>

languages.text:
使用者は{g|Encyclopedia:UnyieldingBeacon}不屈の標{/g}のスタック数に応じた効果に対する耐性を得る：
-<indent=5%>6スタック以上：{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}に対する耐性。</indent>
-<indent=5%>9スタック以上：{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒{/g}に対する耐性。</indent>
-<indent=5%>12スタック以上：{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g}に対する耐性。</indent>
使用者は上記の耐性を全て得る。
languages.original_text:
The wearer gains immunity to effects depending on the number of {g|Encyclopedia:UnyieldingBeacon}unyielding beacon{/g} stacks:
-<indent=5%>6 or more stacks: immunity to {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>9 or more stacks: immunity to {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>12 or more stacks: immunity to {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}.</indent>
The wearer gains all previous immunities.

traits.locale_text:
着用者は{g|Encyclopedia:UnyieldingBeacon}不屈の標{/g}のスタック数に応じた効果に対する免疫力を得る：
- <indent=5%>6スタック以上：{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}に対する免疫</indent>
- <indent=5%>9スタック以上：{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒{/g}に対する免疫</indent>
- <indent=5%>12スタック以上：{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g}に対する免疫</indent>
着用者は以前の免疫力を全て得る。

languages.text:
El portador gana inmunidad a efectos en función del número de acumulaciones de {g|f:fc83a8ac57e54db59c3bb70083dc385c}Dechado de firmeza{/g}:
-<indent=5%>6 acumulaciones o más: Inmune a {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}hemorragia{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>9 acumulaciones o más: Inmune a {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxina{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>12 acumulaciones o más: Inmune a {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}quemadura{/g}.</indent>
El portador obtiene todas las inmunidades correspondientes.

-<indent=5%>12 or more stacks: immunity to {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}.</indent>

-<indent=5%>9 acumulaciones o más: Inmune a {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxina{/g}</indent>
-<indent=5%>12 acumulaciones o más: Inmune a {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}quemadura{/g}</indent>
El portador obtiene todas las inmunidades correspondientes.

languages.text:
Der Träger ist immun gegen Effekte, die sich an der Anzahl von {g|f:fc83a8ac57e54db59c3bb70083dc385c}Symbol der Unnachgiebigkeit{/g} orientieren:
-<indent=5%>6 oder mehr: Immunität gegen {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Blutung{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>9 oder mehr: Immunität gegen {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Gift{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>12 oder mehr: Immunität gegen {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennung{/g}..</indent>
Der Träger erhält alle vorherigen Immunitäten.
languages.original_text:
The wearer gains immunity to effects depending on the number of {g|f:fc83a8ac57e54db59c3bb70083dc385c}unyielding beacon{/g} stacks:
-<indent=5%>6 or more stacks: immunity to {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>9 or more stacks: immunity to {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>12 or more stacks: immunity to {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}.</indent>
The wearer gains all previous immunities.

traits.locale_text:
Der Träger erlangt Immunität gegen Effekte, die sich an der Anzahl von {g|Encyclopedia:UnyieldingBeacon}Symbol der Unnachgiebigkeit{/g} richten:
-<indent=5%>6 oder mehr: Immunität gegen {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Blutung{/g}</indent>
-<indent=5%>9 oder mehr: Immunität gegen {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Gift{/g}</indent>
-<indent=5%>12 oder mehr: Immunität gegen {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennung{/g}</indent>
Der Träger erlangt alle vorherigen Immunitäten.

languages.text:
Персонаж получает иммунитет к некоторым эффектам в зависимости от накопленных {g|Encyclopedia:UnyieldingBeacon}знаков стойкости{/g}:
-<indent=5%>6 или более: иммунитет к {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечению{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>9 или более: иммунитет к {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}отравлению{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>12 или более: иммунитет к {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горению{/g}.</indent>
Иммунитеты, требующие меньшего числа уровней эффекта, сохраняются.
languages.original_text:

-<indent=5%>6 or more stacks: immunity to {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>9 or more stacks: immunity to {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>12 or more stacks: immunity to {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}.</indent>
The wearer gains all previous immunities.

Иммунитеты, требующие меньшего числа уровней эффекта, сохраняются.

Персонаж получает иммунитет к некоторым эффектам в зависимости от накопленных {g|Encyclopedia:UnyieldingBeacon}знаков стойкости{/g}:
-<indent=5%>6 или более: иммунитет к {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечению{/g}</indent>
-<indent=5%>9 или более: иммунитет к {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}отравлению{/g}</indent>
-<indent=5%>12 или более: иммунитет к {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горению{/g}</indent>
Иммунитеты, требующие меньшего числа уровней эффекта, сохраняются.

languages.text:
L'utilisateur devient invulnérable à certains effets, selon le nombre de cumuls de {g|f:fc83a8ac57e54db59c3bb70083dc385c}Guide inflexible{/g} :
-<indent=5%>6 cumuls ou plus : invulnérabilité à l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>9 cumuls ou plus : invulnérabilité à l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxine{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>12 cumuls ou plus : invulnérabilité à l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g}.</indent>
L'utilisateur bénéficie de toutes les invulnérabilités ci-dessus.

-<indent=5%>12 or more stacks: immunity to {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}.</indent>

languages.text:
Takan kişi, {g|f:fc83a8ac57e54db59c3bb70083dc385c}yılmaz fener{/g} birikimi sayısına göre belirli etkilere karşı bağışıklık kazanır:
-<indent=5%>6 veya daha fazla birikim: {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Kanamaya{/g} karşı bağışıklık.</indent>
-<indent=5%>9 veya daha fazla birikim: {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toksine{/g} karşı bağışıklık.</indent>
-<indent=5%>12 veya daha fazla birikim: {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Yanmaya{/g} karşı bağışıklık.</indent>
Kişi, daha az birikim gerektiren bağışıklıkları da taşımaya devam eder.

-<indent=5%>12 or more stacks: immunity to {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}.</indent>
